content.rendered:
Mannheimer Swartling operates from three offices in Sweden. Wherever our lawyers are based, they work in multi-office, multi-practice teams every day to ensure that each client has access to the best possible service.

Mannheimer Swartling was formed in 1990 by a merger between Mannheimer & Zetterlöf and Carl Swartling Advokatbyrå, creating a firm employing some 90 lawyers. Since then, we have grown continually to be the firm we are now with 460 lawyers worldwide. Our aim has remained constant – to deliver the highest quality in everything we do. Our clients in Sweden are based all over the country, and we serve them from offices in Stockholm, Gothenburg and Malmö.

Our expertise

Mannheimer Swartling is a true full-service law firm and our practice covers virtually every area of business law. We operate in the premium segment of business law and our lawyers are very often class-leading in their specialist fields. Sustainability is an integral part of our business, along with the firm’s fundamental values – quality, business focus and team spirit.
Use the menu on the left to read more about our global practice. You will also find contact details for each office.
